summary: 该插件用于检测ShopXO电子商务系统是否存在CNVD-2021-15822任意文件读取漏洞，通过构造特定请求来验证Linux和Windows环境下的漏洞情况。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the ShopXO e-commerce system has the CNVD-2021-15822 arbitrary file read vulnerability by constructing specific requests to verify the vulnerability in both Linux and Windows environments.
